name: Obese Girls | Concept
description:
A request
For generating really heavy girls

Works best with deliberate tagging, also trained on a few keywords but they dont seem particularly potent
Try adjusting the LoRA weight up or down for effect (Pun intended)

Suggested tags: Fat, Fat rolls, Plump, Thick thighs, Thick arms, Big belly, Undersized clothes, Skindentation

Keywords:
WeightChubby : Trained on images of curvaceous but still shapely women

WeightObese : Trained on women more akin to orbs

WeightImmobile : Trained on sentient tubs of lard that cannot move under their own power


Plays well with most other LoRAs
Recommend 0.6-1.3 Strength

If you've enjoyed my models, consider leaving a tip.
https://ko-fi.com/leontalon

meta.prompt:
(extremely detailed CG unity 8k wallpaper),(masterpiece), (best quality), (ultra-detailed), (best illustration),(best shadow), (sitting behind table, eating donut, upper body:1.2),
,BREAK
(grizzlycasual:1), blush, embarrassed, standing,(weightobese, plump,:1.2) (round face:1.3), thick arms, skindentation,
<lora:Fat:1> <lora:(p)GrizzlyMk5:.8>
